content: Hello everyone! We need vloggers for languages Urdu, English, Hindi, Chinese, German, Spanish, Turkish, Korean, French, Nigerian, African, Greek, and Malay! If you have experience in creating video content or to vlog in crypto topics. Please feel free to apply. Please read the instruction from the image banner. Payment is 5000 $NWT tokens for the approved applicants for EACH language.
